title: Geting banned for no reasons
body:
Riot i love lol, but today i had to leave a match to make a fire to heat up the house .and i heard a sound from my computer for the ban and the leverbuster for AFK so i  huried upstairs to move and not get the ban .(and my computer is very slow and our finances are not very good).And by the time i got back to the oven the carpet and the wood cought on fire , my parents did not hit me or anything but the financeal problem is going to cost us 500 dollars to repair the flor carpet and the part of the house . And when i got back up to my computer i got banned and i got so sad and started crying .So riot pls i ask you to do something for my ban and other people who had a similar experince, i ask to atleast to send my some riot ppoint  or be .Thank you for listening to me and i love you and your game hope you developed even more and my family does not strugle any more .

:  )

replies.body: Man I really hope nothing was too damaged in that fire!!!! In the future make sure to settle IRL stuff first, no matter how serious about the game you are! It wouldn't be any good to have won a match when your house is on fire =(
